name: Superwholock Tumblr sidebar customization
description:
Coustomize your side bar by adding a fandom sidebar
posts -> cases
followers -> companions
activity -> heartbeats
drafts -> purgatory 
queue -> waiting

Theme Support | If you need help with anything, just message me on tumblr. Let me know what theme you're using and what you need help with.
